Class UpsertPaymentRefundFlowController.RefundInformation

public class UpsertPaymentRefundFlowController.RefundInformation

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description
public Decimal
amount
 
public String

public String

Fields

@InvocableVariable(required=true description='Total amount for the refund' label='Amount')
public Decimal amount


@InvocableVariable(required=false description='Refund external Id in Firestore. If not provided, it will be automatically generated' label='Refund External Id')
public String id


@InvocableVariable(required=true description='Reason as per why the refund was created' label='Reason')
public String reason


@InvocableVariable(required=true description='Id of the payment the refund will be related to' label='Related Payment Id')
public String relatedPaymentId


@InvocableVariable(required=false description='If not provided, it will be automatically calculated with the system date/time' label='Timestamp')
public Datetime timestamp
